mng: face, side, surface, aspect, top, classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
flour, noodles, (of food) soft (not crunchy), (slang) (of a person) ineffectual, spineless

exm.mng: scene, tableau, picture, image, screen (displayed by a computer), (motion picture) frame, field of view
to face, to turn towards, to incline to, geared towards, catering for, -oriented, facial feature, appearance, aspect, facet
on the other hand, another aspect
